mng: thick weeds, luxuriant growth, Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves, impertinent

exm.mng: a rank growth of grass, uncultivated land, wilderness
Wang Mang (45 BC-23 AD), usurped power and reigned 9-23 between the former and later Han
variant of 魯莽|鲁莽[lu3 mang3]
Chinese anise (Ilicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves)
